data.actual_result: When the messsage has too many blank lines the buttons for this modal could disappear and you have to restart Discord to close it.
data.expected_result: Delete/pin modal should get a scroll bar when then content exceeds the screen.
data.short_description: Delete and pin modal without scroll bar for messages with multiple blank lines
data.steps_to_repro: - Write any message that has one line with text, and then multiple blank lines (more is better) - Send this message - Long press the message and try to delete or pin it - Observe the modal window
